contents.text:
Student topics: Create an AI agent
Weekly study hours: 6
Duration in weeks: 8

Curated resources:
{"rationale":"Recommendations prioritize step-by-step, practical modules on building AI agents with Microsoft tools, especially Copilot Studio and Azure OpenAI, with additional coverage of best practices for solution and lifecycle management. The selected paths and modules are well-suited for an 8-week, 6-hours/week self-study format due to their depth, hands-on focus, and direct connection with the student's goals.","learningPaths":[{"title":"Application lifecycle management for the Power Platform","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/application-lifecycle-management/","estimatedHours":2,"relevance":"Introduces application lifecycle best practices, essential for deploying and managing AI agents and related solutions using Microsoft Power Platform. Covers DevOps basics, solutions management, and use of GitHub Actions."}],"modules":[{"title":"Use Azure AI Services for Language in a Microsoft Copilot Studio","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cognitive-service-power-virtual-agents/","skillFocus":"Hands-on guide to integrating Azure AI language services into custom Copilot Studio bots/agents, covering setup, definition, deployment, and troubleshooting."},{"title":"Introduction to DevOps","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-to-devops/","skillFocus":"Core DevOps concepts needed for professional deployment and lifecycle management of AI-powered solutions."},{"title":"Solution Architect series: Plan application lifecycle management for Power Platform","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/application-lifecycle-management-architect/","skillFocus":"Strategic planning for AI agent environments, solution movement from development to production, and lifecycle management."},{"title":"Introduction to solutions for Microsoft Power Platform","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-solutions/","skillFocus":"Essentials of transporting apps and components between environments—important for iterative AI solution development."},{"title":"Introduction to GitHub Actions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-to-github-actions/","skillFocus":"Automation and CI/CD for code-driven AI agent solutions."}],"targets":[{"title":"Azure AI Engineer Associate (Exam AI-102)","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/certifications/azure-ai-engineer/"}]}

Produce JSON only matching the provided schema

{"rationale":"The milestones build sequentially: start with AI agent basics and language integration (team hands-on), establish application lifecycle practices, and then progressively deepen skills in DevOps, solutions management, lifecycle strategy, and automation. More challenging modules are spaced apart and reinforced with reviews before new topics. The distribution ensures steady progress without overload, with time built in for hands-on work and periodic consolidation to support real project readiness.","planTitle":"Create an AI Agent: Microsoft Copilot Studio & Azure AI Focused Study Plan","durationWeeks":8,"weeklyHours":6,"weeklyMilestones":[{"weekNumber":1,"objective":"Gain foundational knowledge of AI agents and setup environment.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Read introduction sections of the Copilot Studio and Azure AI modules.","Note AI agent concepts and key tools."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Explore Microsoft Copilot Studio interface in a demo or test environment.","Summarize capabilities pertinent to AI agent creation."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Review Azure AI services overview; watch a short video demo if possible.","Begin notes on integration between Copilot Studio and Azure AI."]}],"checkpoint":"Environment set up for Copilot Studio and Azure AI; basic understanding articulated in a summary."},{"weekNumber":2,"objective":"Hands-on: Integrate Azure AI Services into Copilot Studio agents.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Work through the 'Use Azure AI Services for Language in a Microsoft Copilot Studio' module up to initial setup and connection steps."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue module, focusing on defining intents and triggers in a Copilot Studio bot."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Deploy a test AI agent; experiment with language understanding features.","Troubleshoot common issues using module guidance."]}],"checkpoint":"Successfully complete and interact with a Copilot Studio agent that uses Azure AI language services."},{"weekNumber":3,"objective":"Grasp core application lifecycle management for Power Platform.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Begin Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) learning path (first module): read and take notes on main principles."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue with lifecycle management basics—focus on developing and deploying changes."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Apply lifecycle concepts to your AI agent project (plan dev/test/prod mapping)."]}],"checkpoint":"Document a basic workflow for your agent’s lifecycle and environments."},{"weekNumber":4,"objective":"Explore solutions management on Power Platform for scalable AI agent projects.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Complete the module 'Introduction to solutions for Microsoft Power Platform'."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Apply solution packaging to your AI agent (create a solution, add components)."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Review and test transporting a solution between environments."]}],"checkpoint":"AI agent and any customizations packaged in a Power Platform solution and transferred between sandbox environments."},{"weekNumber":5,"objective":"Deepen lifecycle management strategies for production-readiness.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Begin the 'Plan application lifecycle management for Power Platform' module (architect series)."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue architectural considerations (environments, deployment strategies, security relevance)."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Sketch a strategic lifecycle plan for your agent covering dev to prod."]}],"checkpoint":"A draft strategic lifecycle plan/map for your AI agent solution, aligning best practices."},{"weekNumber":6,"objective":"Learn DevOps essentials for robust AI agent delivery.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Start 'Introduction to DevOps' module; understand continuous integration and delivery."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Relate DevOps principles to Power Platform and AI agent projects via examples."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Draft a DevOps adoption roadmap for your own AI project."]}],"checkpoint":"A concise DevOps plan linked to your AI agent’s lifecycle; module quiz/passed section as proof."},{"weekNumber":7,"objective":"Apply automation with GitHub Actions for Power Platform solutions.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Begin 'Introduction to GitHub Actions' module and set up a demo repository."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Implement a basic CI/CD workflow for solution deployment with GitHub Actions."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Test automation flows and troubleshoot errors."]}],"checkpoint":"Working example of GitHub Actions automating part of your solution’s deployment pipeline."},{"weekNumber":8,"objective":"Consolidate, review, and prepare for real-world/practice assessment.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Review all module notes and project artifacts; list key learnings and remaining gaps."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Simulate lifecycle: update agent, repackage, redeploy with automation; fix any issues."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Reflect on progress and outline actionable next steps (e.g. pursuing certification, building a portfolio, or launching a pilot use case)."]}],"checkpoint":"End-to-end working demo/prototype; readiness evaluation. Next steps documented."}],"briefMessageToUser":"This plan guides you from foundational skills to hands-on deployment of AI agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio and Azure AI, with a strong focus on lifecycle and DevOps. Stick with it each week—consistency leads to technical confidence and real-world capability. By the end, you’ll be capable of building, managing, and scaling modern AI agents with best practices. Good luck!"}
